title: Stuck at authenticating.
body: Was in a game lobby when the game crashed. Now when I try to log in I get stuck on authenticating or it just gives an error message.

replies.body: Have been trying to troubleshoot for almost 2 hours now :D
Wow that just happen to me 2 glad to see I'm not the only one if you find out let me know lol
Thanks guys, everything should be resolved at this point!
Having the same problem..  I am so god damn pissed off right now.  I have never had a problem like this before.  FIX IT
